abstract: Carl C. Icahn has gained fame over the years at least as much from his blunt talk as from his investment prowess. But the former came to the fore as the billionaire investor sat down for a chat with PEHub’s Dan Primack, who wanted to know about Mr. Icahn’s two investments in Motricity, a wireless content startup.
lead_paragraph: Carl C. Icahn has gained fame over the years at least as much from his blunt talk as from his investment prowess. But the former came to the fore as the billionaire investor sat down for a chat with PEHub’s Dan Primack, who wanted to know about Mr. Icahn’s two investments in Motricity, a wireless content startup.

headline.main: Icahn’s Family Ties Bind Him to Sinking Motricity
